channel.title: Ironpython on Brain Baking

item.title: ironpython
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: IronPython Interessante links: * Iron Python In Action - Dark corners * IronPython .NET Integration documentation * Python Tools for Visual Studio C#/Python interop C# in Python Overerving In Python C# klassen over laten erven gaat zonder meer. Constructors werken niet via _ _init_ _ maar via new: The init method is the Python initializer method. It is an instance method and so receives the instance as the first argument, which by convention is called self.
